text:
Wanderu | Senior Front-End Engineer | Boston, MA, US | Full-time | Onsite | https://www.wanderu.com/

Wanderu is a 4-year-old startup leader in the transportation space. We are looking for a front-end engineer who can write great code and great tests. Your work will be seen by millions of users! Our technologies are: react, redux, express, universal/isomorphic apps, lerna, ES6+, webpack, etc

Make your mark on the world!

Apply here: https://www.wanderu.com/jobs
